channel.title: Arga Video
channel.description:
I'll keep this link here for a few days.
Firstly. 1. Yes pplsuqbawlz does has a library. 2. Yes he has a bot. 3. Yes we have code as proof. 4. No you cant have it. Its not ours to give 5. Yes alot of ARGA's detectability is based off alot of information from him, like overriding AppletStub and a runtime loader. Also he has given about 25 lines of code...A record! <3
READ THE FREAKING READ ME BEFORE ASKING QUESTIONS.
Any flame, leave it for another topic because i dont care/want to listen/read
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=R7T6072U

item.title: Arga Video
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:36, topic:13457”][quote author=Taios link=topic=20020.msg229124#msg229124 date=1157812227]

gave me a porn pupup glad my parents were not in the room…

but about 15secs of that vid was it chasing a chicken while under attack and then random clicking off of a chicken while fighting needs a little work but good job.

Nope? It was attacking.

Its the mouse movmements that need work, there’s a few too many misclicks. We partially fixed it now :), when i was attacking some giant spiders i got about 3 misclicks and 10 wernt :), its just tweaking things.
[/quote]
ok this si how i do it.
Have a seperate thread do the mouse.
Have you script order the click then x ms later check to make sure it still thier if not their send the mouse thread a new order and that new order will have it halt the current movement and re assign, this is how mine is multi threaded.[/quote]

Ye, we will be doing the mouse on a thread. Probaly over the next few days or after we have nearly finished.

Read full topic

item.title: Arga Video
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:32, topic:13457”][quote author=Cheatest link=topic=20020.msg228107#msg228107 date=1157787842]
gave me a porn pupup glad my parents were not in the room…

but about 15secs of that vid was it chasing a chicken while under attack and then random clicking off of a chicken while fighting needs a little work but good job.
[/quote]

Nope? It was attacking.

Its the mouse movmements that need work, there’s a few too many misclicks. We partially fixed it now :), when i was attacking some giant spiders i got about 3 misclicks and 10 wernt :), its just tweaking things.[/quote]
ok this si how i do it.
Have a seperate thread do the mouse.
Have you script order the click then x ms later check to make sure it still thier if not their send the mouse thread a new order and that new order will have it halt the current movement and re assign, this is how mine is multi threaded.

Read full topic

item.title: Arga Video
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:34, topic:13457”][quote author=nix link=topic=20020.msg229332#msg229332 date=1157819823]

gave me a porn pupup glad my parents were not in the room…

but about 15secs of that vid was it chasing a chicken while under attack and then random clicking off of a chicken while fighting needs a little work but good job.

Nope? It was attacking.

Its the mouse movmements that need work, there’s a few too many misclicks. We partially fixed it now :), when i was attacking some giant spiders i got about 3 misclicks and 10 wernt :), its just tweaking things.

you want to keep a few missclicks tho. less detectable then
[/quote]

Not overly, i assume when you play you dont misclick alot :P. So long as the mouse movement is really random and humal like and it never clicks the same place on a npc, it should be fine :)[/quote]

yeah i spose but every 1 misses now and then

Read full topic
